name: Reference - CAR-2013-04-002: Quick execution of a series of suspicious commands - MITRE
x_kb_abstract: Certain commands are frequently used by malicious actors and infrequently used by normal users. By looking for execution of these commands in short periods of time, we can not only see when a malicious user was on the system but also get an idea of what they were doing.
x_kb_reference_title: CAR-2013-04-002: Quick execution of a series of suspicious commands
